Input Database

The input database routines provide support for a simple input capability. User input files consist of a hierarchical collection of (keyword,value) pairs, where the value may be either arrays or a single value of int, double, complex, string, or box.

  • SAMRAI::tbox::InputDatabase
  • SAMRAI::tbox::InputManager
  • SAMRAI::tbox::Parser
